    public interface WebDriverManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities capabilities)
      Get a WebDriver instance based on the given desired Capabilities.
      void quitWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
